name: C4D Woo Category Carousel
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
A plugin for Woocommerce: list category by carousel slider

This plugin is used in C4D Vision – Responsive WooCommerce Theme

You can view here http://coffee4dev.com/responsive-woocommerce-theme-c4d-vision/

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘c4d woo category carousel’
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Woo Category Carousel.
  2. Upload the ‘c4d-woo-category-carousel’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.
